page.title: 13The Ghost of Tempsford Hall
page.content: As well as a church most older English villages have a manor house.Tempsford hall has a very rich history including its own ghost.In the summer of 1848 when a Mr & Mrs Elliot held the tenancy of the hall,they reported hearing gostly footsteps and found doors bolted for no reason. Several of their servants left in fear. In August two visual sightings were recorded.The first was a white figure passing by a window the second a man dressed in deep mourning picking roses from the garden.No recorded explanations have been found to explain the supposed occult presences other than perhaps the Elliots wished to be freed from their tenancy committments.
